tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
To begin with would like to thank Dr. Meghana from bottom of our hearts for making us live and enjoy this blissful nine month journey.

We thank god for making us connect with her who practices what she preaches, truly an amazing soul.

Our case was that of placenta previa (a condition where chances of natural delivery is low). The approach with which doctor connected and guided us, is really appreciative. She focused on the solution rather than discussing and analyzing the problem statement with us. At all the times she did shared with us the relevant information and kept us informed and along, thereby drawing a perfect balance. With her being at our side we would say this was indeed a normal (cesarean) delivery :-)

She is truly an expert both professionally and at personal level. 

The easy at which she makes the key decisions reflects her command on the subject. There are no communication barriers when it comes to connecting with her, and this characteristic played such an important role for us and I am sure it would for all such first time expected parent's. Our relationship with her grew naturally from that of a patient and doctor (as normally expected) to that of positive, confident to be mother and strong sturdy medical and emotional support.

Thank you once again from us (Swati and Faisal) and of course our chota pataka little angel Ridah. God bless you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
It is because of Dr. Meghna Sarvaiya I am visiting Cloudnine, else the waiting time is really exhausting and irritating...  Management should really look at key points:
1. During doctor consultation, usual time spent per patient is 20-30mins, then why the appointments are book at every 15mins interval? 
2. Doctor faculty is less and patients are more. The management should work on average visits per day and appoint more doctors.  It's a maternity home, pregnant females and patients with new born to toddlers face a lot of problem in sitting and waiting. 
3. In case of any technical problem, keep visiting patients informed so that they can decide if they can wait further or visit some other day.  Making them wait with no result is even more irritating. 
4. Your ground staff needs a proper training on crisis management as they start putting things on others when any issue is raised.  

Don't know how much this feedback would be considered...  But I think someone has to raise this, so I did.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I totally recommend DR Meghna Ma'am, she not only explain us every aspect of pregnancy but also make sure that patient is fine n comfortable with the treatment. As a doctor she is superb and as human being she is brilliant, I was her patient but she treat me like little sister. From the time I entered in OT and delivered she was always there for me, encouraging me n motivating me. It is very rare to get such a good doctor n human being. I totally recommend her to everyone who want to start  journey of pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Meghana had conducted my first delivery 7 yrs back and I highly recommend her to everyone
She's kind compassionate and very very caring 
Unlike other gynacs who are very clinical in their approach to the special time of pregnancy,  doctor Meghana makes one feel special and cared all the time
She's available on call for any small or big issues u might face during pregnancy and her lositivr aura heals *** ** your worries and illness 
Doctor Meghana is really a rare and special doctor in her field

tags: None
review: *** ****** ** ****** ******* ****** * *** **** ***** making me feel comfortable & giving appropriate answers to all my queries during my entire pregnancy. I was very conscious as it was my first time conceiving, but she make me feel confident to end up with normal delivery, which I was looking for. Also, * **** ***** **** **** ************* *** a positive personality, which is more important. I strongly recommend Dr. Meghna to everyone. In fact, also would like to mention here that I also met Dr. Meghna with my family friend's reference only, who had her baby delivered by Dr. Meghna.

tags: None
review:
Amazing experience. We happened to reach there by one of the references and so i volunteer to step up and free text so as the expecting couples gets benefitted.

We (me and my wife) are extremely delighted with the overall care and caution taken care by doctor and personal , undivided attention that was available. We always had this feeling and comfort from day 1 that we are in safe hands. As they say , right upstream effects helps and so happened in our case. We are done with our journey and are a proud parent of a new born baby. Can recommend big time for onlookers and expecting couples. Good luck Reader.

tags: None
review: Pleasue to write feedback for Dr. Meghna who is really a great personality.I am having super awesome experience with her.. she is a super star for me not because she is solving my health issues but she guides me like a teacher and treat me like her family. Usually we all feel stressed when we visit doctor for our health issues but the moment you talk to her your stress flies away... Big smile on her face make me feel refreshed, the way she discuss things is just like big thing looks small. She always make me feel comfortable. Unlike others she never indulge you for unnecessary tests n medications. She understands the pain n mindset of patients so well. I can bet all patients feels the same for her. She is a blessing for all patients. Happy and lucky to be with Dr Meghna.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The overall experience was very cordial. I left her cabin smiling. All my queries were answered with polite answers. I found the doctor very interactive. I am happy to know that she will take care of my entire pregnancy process. I am sure that i am in safe hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:

Thank you so much for giving me the world world's best thing in my life... That's my angel baby NITYASHREE...

Thanks for being there mam'...

review: The doctor was not clearly explaining the problem and the concern areas. A simple yes or no response without a proper explanation of the issue is not satisfactory.
